item.title: Simone White was one of six tourists who died after drinking free shots at a hostel in Vang Vieng. It is thought those drinks were tainted with methanol, a toxic substance that is sometimes mixed with alcohol illegally to cut costs. #Methanol #Laos #VangV
item.description: Simone White was one of six tourists who died after drinking free shots at a hostel in Vang Vieng. It is thought those drinks were tainted with methanol, a toxic substance that is sometimes mixed with alcohol illegally to cut costs. #Methanol #Laos #VangV
